Physics

类 RadarModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Physics.RadarModel

  • public class RadarModel
extends java.lang.Object
    RadarModel is used for calculate and implement radar event
    作者:
    WangShuzheng

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RadarModel

        public RadarModel(Object owner,
                  Radar myRadar)
        Constructor
        参数:
        owner - owner of this Radar model
        myRadar - radar which use this model

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRadarTargetList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Object> getRadarTargetList()

      • RadarScanPointerIncreament

        public void RadarScanPointerIncreament()

      • getActualDetecRange

        public static double getActualDetecRange(double RCS,
                                         double Range)
        Calculate the actual detect range of a radar detecter the detect range is Proportional to the 1/4th power of RCS
        参数:
        RCS - Radar reflection cross-sectional area
        Range - standard detect range(in this game, standard data is the range when detect target with RCS=2)
        返回:
        actual detect range

      • radarDetect

        public void radarDetect(Object object)
        Detect an object by radar system the target need to be covered in the radar detect envelop and is alive also it will implement the function of radar guide for radar missle some radar has look down limitaion, it can't detect target below them for more than a certain angle
        参数:
        object - the object detected

      • RadarGuide

        public void RadarGuide(Object object)
        give the radar guide missle the target detected by radar
        参数:
        object - the target

      • helmetGuide

        public void helmetGuide(Object object,
                        double helmetDirection,
                        double detectRange)
        give the missle the target detected by helmet aimer
        参数:
        object - the target
        helmetDirection - the sight direction of helmet aimer
        detectRange - the visual detect range, defined to be 3000

      • RadarWarning

        public boolean RadarWarning(ExternalLoad load,
                            RadarModel enemyRadar)
        the radar warning function, to detect and warn the radar missle lauched from enemy
        参数:
        load - the missle from enemy
        enemyRadar - the radar which guide this missle
        返回:
        true if is in range of radar warning distance and owner is captured by enemy
